attributes.action: Give hospitals far more money to take on Biomedical scientists students for their training year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Biomedical scientists work in hospital pathology labs, such as the haematology, and histology departments, they are highly skilled, needed, and in short supply. many hospitals cannot take on 1 or more BMS students on their training year due to lack of sufficient funding, and as such students are being discouraged from entering the proffesion upon graduation.
